column4: I have a question that probably has a simple answer.  Problem: Once I opened firefox thru terminal as SUDO and now if I try to simply open it via the icon, firefox opens as a dummied down version.  I don't even have ability to click on back & forward buttons.
Why did you open the firefox via terminal?
ALT+F2 --> firefox -safe-mode    (Test it... then start Firefox again, see if that solved your issue).
